description: Stores claim-level diagnosis information sent on Resolute Professional Billing claims. Diagnosis information is coming from the INV 350 related group. The Group 100 column corresponds to claims that were sent.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count value of the invoice related group.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis that is associated with the claim.

columns.name: INV_NUM
columns.description: The external ID of the invoice that is associated with the claim.

columns.name: INV_NUM_100_GRP_LN
columns.description: Claim line number that the diagnosis entry applies to. This is the line number that links the INV_DX_INFO table with the LINE column in the INV_BASIC_INFO table.
